TopicTitle: I think I just encountered genius

Articles.Content:
Please forgive my newbie enthusiasm.

I went to Kerbal X to see what people are building and to learn. I downloaded Tanisinbo's planes  just because they seemed so odd. I wound up taking apart Nameless Fighter Number 3 just to see how he did it.

To be fair, I have not been playing of a very long time, (so maybe I am being over enthusiastic), but I have never encountered a better aircraft.  Nameless Fighter Number 1 may just be the most fun plane I have ever had the pleasure of flying.  Tanisinbo is thinking way outside the box; not only are they unique, they perform flawlessly.

Edited May 13, 2018 by Klapaucius
This sharing of craft has been moved to the craft sharing subforum.
